review: **** **** ******* explains patiently and friendly. Gives suitable tests and medicines accordingly. Also  Children like him very much.

Every child is precious to their parents. When my daughter was encountered with a ortho problem, I was really worried on who to approach. My paediatric doctor suggested Dr. Hemchand and after an appointment with him all my worries were put at bay. I feel my kid is in safe hands. I believe that my kid will get cured soon.
